content: notes coaster portion is worked in continuous rounds do not slip_stitch to join at row 7 you begin working back and forth in row please visit my blog at www micahmakes com/ tips-tricks/how-to-make-a- magic-circle for instructions on using the magic_ring technique coaster cozy will fit your standard 10-11 oz mug gauge is 7 sts equals 2 inches in pattern supplies worsted weight cotton yarn i used lily sugar ʻnʼ cream - approximately 40 yards us h hook yarn needle button thread and needle for attaching button the mug coaster cozy copyright © 2011 micah york copyright © 2011 micah york moc sekamhacim round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 round 3 ✽ single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ repeat around 18 round 4 ✽ single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ repeat around 24 round 5 ✽ single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ repeat around 30 round 6 ✽ single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ repeat around 36 row 7 slip_stitch in next st chain 1 single_crochet in same st ✽ skip next st 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ 16 times chain 1 turn 33 row 8-16 single_crochet in first st ✽ skip next st 2 single_crochet in next st ✽ repeat across chain 1 turn 33 row 17 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in first st single_crochet across to last st in the row single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in last st single_crochet evenly down the edge across the 3 base sts and up the other edge slip_stitch to join in the first single_crochet chain 14 slip_stitch in same st fasten_off and weave in loose end finishing sew your button on the corner opposite the chain-14 loop you made in row 17 fit a mug into your cozy slip the loop over the button and pour yourself a nice hot cup of coffee or tea enjoy all patterns are copyright protected rewriting reselling distributing or copying this pattern is prohibited if you would like to sell finished products produced from this pattern please credit me as the pattern designer as follows pattern by micah makes www micahmakes com 2
